```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, fig.width = 9.5}
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(DT)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
dtable = read_delim("../data/andic.tsv", delim ="\t")#, header = T)
dtable = select(dtable, c(-SEGMENTS, -COG_ID))
data_wide = pivot_wider(dtable, names_from = IDIOM, values_from = TRANSCRIPTION, id_cols = c(CONCEPT_ID, CONCEPT), values_fill = NA)
datatable(data_wide, filter = list(position = 'top', clear = FALSE, plain = TRUE), rownames = FALSE,  extensions = c( 'Buttons','ColReorder'), options = list(pageLength = 20, dom = 'Bfrtip' , buttons = list(list(extend = 'colvis', columns = 2:21)), autoWidth = F, colReorder = list(realtime = FALSE), fixedHeader = TRUE), escape = FALSE)
```
